daVinci_node_attribute(?Name, ++Type, ++Value)

Set an attribute for a node in the graph
Name
a Prolog Term
Type
an atom
Value
an atom

Description

This predicate is used to set an attribute of a node in the graph. For a list of all possible attributes and their values, please refer to the daVinci documentation Reference Manual. Typical attributes are 'COLOR','FONTSYTLE','BORDER' to set the appearance of the node, and 'OBJECT' to change the label displayed in the node.

Fail Conditions

no

Resatisfiable

no

Examples

see daVinci_begin/0

See Also

daVinci_node / 1, daVinci_node / 2
